title.rendered: Real-World Cybersecurity: Process-Driven Managed Detection & Response

content.rendered:
Tightening Cybersecurity Posture with a Secret Weapon

Defending your IT environment can be a lot like being a secret agent. How do you know if you’re winning the battle against threats? Learn the secret weapon for a strong cybersecurity posture as Davis Mendoza, VP of Technology Operations at Icon Media Direct, sits down with Shawn Brown, COO, Snap Tech IT, to discuss: 

  • Challenges & opportunities discovered in Icon Media’s environment
  • The linchpin of a proven process to strengthen security…the Risk Analysis
  • Significance of ongoing analysis to support strategic security planning

 

For additional educational & thought leadership material on CyberDefense, visit our Resources page: https://www.snaptechit.com/resources/.

excerpt.rendered: Join Karl Bickmore, CEO, Snap Tech IT and Shawn Brown, COO, Snap Tech IT, as they walk you through a real-world scenario where the source of the attack was identified, lateral movement through the environment was halted, & the steps taken to neutralize the threat.
